text: indrO# vRuqtrAyaq vajraqmuda#yacCaqth sa vRuqtrO vajrAqdudya#tAdabiBEqth sO$&bravIqnmA mEq pra hAqrastiq vA iqdaM mayi# vIqryaM# tat tEq pra dA$syAqmItiq tasmA# uqkthya#M prAya#cCaqt tasmai$ dviqtIyaqmuda#yacCaqth sO$&bravIqnmA maq pra hAqrastiq vA iqdaM mayi# vIqrya#M tat tEq pra dA$syAqmItiq- [  ] 1
